effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 549,686 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 252,593.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

(4) Set: Temporal Compression increases the healing of your next empower spell by 5% per stack.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 10,829 for 15 sec.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
